QUDOS 2016
About QUDOS Call for papers Important dates Organization Program

Program

Timing:

  • Full and tool papers: 20+10 min

08:30-08:45

Registration

08:45-09:00

Opening and Welcome

09:00-10:30

Technical Session 1 (Chair: Danilo Ardagna)

  • Keynote: Increase Performance Awareness in DevOps Scenarios
    Petr Tůma (Charles University Prague, CZ)
  • Modelling Multi-tier Enterprise Applications Behaviour with Design of Experiments Technique
    Tatiana Ustinova and Pooyan Jamshidi (Imperial College London, UK)

10:30-11:00

Coffee Break

11:00-12:30

Technical Session 2 (Chair: Giuliano Casale)

  • A DevOps Approach to Integration of Software Components in an EU Research Project
    Mark Stillwell and Jose Coutinho (Imperial College London, UK)

  • Continuous Deployment of Multi-cloud Systems
    Nicolas Ferry, Franck Chauvel, Hui Song, and Arnor Solberg (SINTEF, Norway)

  • Model-Based Performance Evaluations in Continuous Delivery Pipelines
    Markus Dlugi, Andreas Brunnert, and Helmut Krcmar (fortiss, Germany; Technische Universität München, Germany)

12:30-13:30

Lunch Break

13:30-15:30

Technical Session 3 (Chair: Andreas Brunnert)

  • DevOps Meets Formal Modelling in High-Criticality Complex Systems
    Marta Olszewska and Marina Waldén (Abo Akademi University, Finland)

  • A Proactive Approach for Runtime Self-Adaptation Based on Queueing Network Fluid Analysis
    Emilio Incerto, Mirco Tribastone, and Catia Trubiani (Gran Sasso Science Institute, Italy; IMT Institute for Advanced Studies, Italy)

  • SPACE4Cloud: A DevOps Environment for Multi-cloud Applications
    Michele Guerriero, Michele Ciavotta, Giovanni Paolo Gibilisco, and Danilo Ardagna (Politecnico di Milano, Italy)

  • Filling the Gap: A Tool to Automate Parameter Estimation for Software Performance Models
    Weikun Wang, Juan F. Perez, and Giuliano Casale (Imperial College London, UK)

15:30-16:00

Coffee Break

16:00-17:30

Break-out Group Session

  • SPEC Research Group DevOps Working Group Introduction
    Andreas Brunnert, André van Hoorn
  • Break-out group discussions

17:30-17:45

Closing

19:00 - 22:00

Dinner (self-paid, details will be announced on the day of the workshop)
